resources.string: Failed to initialize the buy library
An error occurred in the store server.
You already have an active Payment window. Please close the app and try again if the problem continues.
The transaction cannot be completed because the account is abnormally logged in. Please close the app and try again.
A temporary error has occurred. Please try again later.
An error occurred while adding items. Please contact our customer service center.
The connection is unstable. Please try again later.
Sorry. The transaction cannot be completed because this device is unsupported.
This market does not support transactions. Please check your market information.
${productName} (${price}won)\nDo you want to buy the selected items?
Do you want to buy the selected items?\n\nPlease wait until the transaction is complete. This may take a while.
